title: I Made a Mecha Kha'Zix Thing
body: I'm taking Pottery in school and i made a thing. I'm still not finished with it, but i'm really proud of it and i thought i should share it with you guys :^)

replies.body: This is really cool! You should definitely post a photo when it's finished!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=chMurEmj,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-22T18:54:45.697+0000)
>
> This is really cool! You should definitely post a photo when it's finished!

Sure Will :)
'Hah, I FOUND You beast...' {{champion:107}}
Nope, it's just Chuck Testa.
bear my children
Why don't they offer a Pottery class where you spend the semester studying Harry Potter
Wingardium Leviosa?..

> [{quoted}](name=Guzman,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=chMurEmj,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-02-22T18:30:37.196+0000)
>
> Wingardium Leviosar?..

Ftfy
Bro are u gonna make the whole thing or just the head? if ur making the whole thing...I'm sending u that skin for free

> [{quoted}](name=LemonadeDan,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=chMurEmj,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-02-23T02:30:33.963+0000)
>
> Bro are u gonna make the whole thing or just the head? if ur making the whole thing...I'm sending u that skin for free

Unfortunately i can only do the head :( , my art teacher only let me use a certain amount of clay
I feel your pain.
I'm sure Rengar would do... very questionable things, for this head.
Very cool! Definitely interested in seeing it through the stages!

What clay are you using and what did you do to keep the antennas from falling off?
I'm also in a ceramics class but sadly it only focuses on pots, but I made Baron just need to glaze it.

> [{quoted}](name=chipi99,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=chMurEmj,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2015-02-23T17:21:34.767+0000)
>
> What clay are you using and what did you do to keep the antennas from falling off?
> I'm also in a ceramics class but sadly it only focuses on pots, but I made Baron just need to glaze it.

I forgot what clay I used, ill have to ask, i made like stubs so i can just slide in the antennas, everything is hollowed out :)
I can't even contain, this is really cool man, keep it up.
This is really cool! Are you going to paint it next? Would love to see updates as you continue work on this.

> [{quoted}](name=Tamat,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=chMurEmj,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-02-23T10:41:04.953+0000)
>
> This is really cool! Are you going to paint it next? Would love to see updates as you continue work on this.

I am for sure painting it, but having mixed feelings about glazing it, it still needs to be fired and hopefully it doesn't break in the kiln :) I'll update is as soon as it comes out of the kiln and my process in painting.
Someone needs to make a Rengar one and then do battle.
{{champion:33}} ok
I'd like to see you do a better job.

> [{quoted}](name=TridentSPQR,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=chMurEmj,comment-id=0009000000010001,timestamp=2015-02-23T04:46:00.747+0000)
>
> I'd like to see you do a better job.

I'm only an amateur :) Its all for fun
{{champion:33}} Alright

10/10 mlg response 

   





















Luv ur pottery, cant wait to see the finished product
